name: Sour dough bread Soly
instructions: Set aside for an hour to rest
Knead well until it is not sticky (you can use the folds, and some people put it in a mixer)
Set aside for half an hour
Set aside for half an hour
Place in a bowl to rise for about 10 to 12 hours (overnight covered on the counter)
Create a shape and put in the refrigerator for about 24 hours
